game.title: The Lost Artefact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artefact from the forgotten tomb
game.description: The artefact of ancient power has been lost in the forgotten tomb. You have been entrusted with the mission to recover it and bring it back safely.

task.objective: Locate the entrance of the tomb
task.description: The old map given by High Priest Orion will lead you to the entrance of the forgotten tomb.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the tomb
task.description: Overcome the powerful guardian that protects the artefact. Be prepared for battle.
Find and retrieve the artefact from its resting place. Be wary of any potential traps.
